original_title: Night of Too Many Stars: An Overbooked Concert for Autism Education
overview: Jon Stewart hosts this fund-raiser for autism charities from New York City's Beacon Theatre. Performers include Will Ferrell, Adam Sandler, Tina Fey, Rosie O'Donnell, Conan O'Brien, Sarah Silverman and Steve Carell.
title: Night of Too Many Stars: An Overbooked Concert for Autism Education
